title: Decreasing Functions
text: For some decreasing function a, a(x) grows smaller as $$x$$ grows larger.

title: Decreasing Functions
text: For two values i,j>i;a(i)>a(j) when a is a decreasing function.

title: Decreasing Functions
text: For another decreasing function $$b$$, since $$a\left(i\right)>a\left(j\right)$$, then $$b\left(a\left(j\right)\right)<b\left(a\left(i\right)\right)$$.
